name: Mesmerize: Distort
description:
PLAYSTATION®Eye required. Presented in High-Definition 1080p resolution, Mesmerize™: Distort is a suite of absorbing visual and aural effects that responds to your body movements and sounds, such as clapping or snapping your fingers. Use the motion of your hands to maneuver colorful ribbons to create incredible 3D patterns in Blurmotion and make virtual vegetation spring to life. There's all this and more in Mesmerize™: Distort, a revolutionary Interactive Art experience.
